term.title: adhesional wetting

item.text: A process in which an adhesional joint is formed between two phases.

sources.item: PAC, 1972, 31, 577. 'Manual of Symbols and Terminology for Physicochemical Quantities and Units, Appendix II: Definitions, Terminology and Symbols in Colloid and Surface Chemistry' on page 597 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197231040577)
